model-value.description: Model of the component. Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) or use 'v-model' directive.

value.description: Specify checkbox value, when used 'string[]' for 'model-value'.

label.description: Checkbox label. Default slot has priority over this property.

name.description: Native input name property. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair.

size.description: Change the size of the component.

description.description: Useful for specifying longer description for input field.

color.description: Color of icon in CSS units including Nova color palette.

default.description: Default slot can be used as label. Has priority over 'label' property.
